incidents.name: Inbound Calls And Message Delivery Delays to Subset of United Kingdom Phone Numbers

incident_updates.body: The issue affecting inbound calls and messages to a subset of Twilio United Kingdom phone numbers has been resolved, and the service is functioning normally at this time.

We have started seeing recovery for inbound calls and SMS to Twilio United Kingdom phone numbers. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to experience inbound calls and message delivery delays to a subset of Twilio United Kingdom Phone Numbers. Customers may experience latency in receiving SMS messages and calls from various mobile networks in United Kingdom. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing inbound calls and message delivery delays to a subset of Twilio United Kingdom Phone Numbers. Customers may experience latency in receiving SMS messages and calls from various mobile networks in United Kingdom. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Flex Insights Historical Reporting Degraded

incident_updates.body: Flex Insights historical reporting was degraded on 30 January 2023 between 6:31 AM and 6:50 AM PST Pacific Time. During this period customers may have experienced latency loading data or may have been unable to access data in their Flex Insights dashboard. The issue has now been resolved and data is loading normally.

incidents.name: Very SMS Delivery Failures in Singapore

incident_updates.body: Verify SMS was degraded for 13 hours and 20 minutes between 5:17 PM 01/20/2023 and 8:37 AM Pacific Time on 01/21/2023. During this period, customers in Singapore were unable to send messages to destinations handled by Momentum MNO and had about 90% of their messages filtered. This issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Marketplace Services Down in US1

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing issue with Marketplace services. This incident has been resolved.

For the incident impacting Marketplace services, we have observed a recovery for all services. We will be monitoring all services to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently experiencing issues with creating Pay Connectors or updating existing Pay connectors. There is no impact on creating tokens or capturing payments. We expect to provide another update in 2 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still experiencing issues creating tokens or capture payments using Twilio Pay on Voice calls  in the US1 region. Our engineering team is actively looking into the issue. We expect to provide an update within 2 hours or as soon as information become available.

We are still experiencing issues creating tokens or capture payments using Twilio Pay on Voice calls  in the US1 region. Our engineering team is actively looking into the issue. We expect to provide an update within an hour or as soon as information become available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Marketplace Services. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Multiple Twilio Usage and Reporting Products Impacted by Request Timeouts and Delays in Handling New Data

incident_updates.body: Super SIM Usage Records API and Data Insights, Messaging Insights, Monitor Events, and Account Insights were degraded for 11 minutes between 19:13:20 UTC and 19:24:10 UTC on 01/24/2023. During this period, customers may have experienced request timeouts and/or delays in recent events being reflected in results from API responses or Console.

incidents.name: Issues Creating New Frontline Instances on Twilio Accounts

incident_updates.body: New account creation for Frontline in Twilio console is operating normally at this time. This incident is resolved.

New account creation for Frontline in Twilio console is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue causing problems creating new Frontline instances on Twilio Accounts and are working to deploy a fix. 

Current workaround to create new Frontline instances is to use the following URL:
https://console.twilio.com/us1/develop/frontline?frameUrl=%2Fconsole%2Ffrontline%2Foverview%3Fx-target-region%3Dus1. 

We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to investigate customer reports of issues creating new Frontline instances on Twilio accounts. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

While we investigate, a workaround to create new Frontline instances is to use the following URL:
https://console.twilio.com/us1/develop/frontline?frameUrl=%2Fconsole%2Ffrontline%2Foverview%3Fx-target-region%3Dus1

We are investigating customer reports of issues creating new Frontline instances on Twilio accounts. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We've become aware of a potential issue with creation of new accounts in console. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating Issues With Creation of New Accounts

incident_updates.body:
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with New Account creation. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Automated Alert: No Customer Impact

incident_updates.body: The alert that was raised and that reported SMS issues in Singapore was resolved by mistake. After investigation, it was determined that there was customer impact. incidents.name: Support Service Disruption on Twilio Console

incident_updates.body: Our engineers investigated a customer impact of a retroactive issue with Support Service Disruption on Twilio Console that was degraded for 30 minutes between 3:10 PM and 3:40 PM Pacific Time on 01/04/2023.  During this period, customers may have experienced issues with appropriately submitting tickets, chat with agents, view their ticket history, or see their current support plan during the outage window.

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to South Africa Vodacom network from South Africa phone numbers. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
